content:
I'm using our awesome nightly updates currently and today, after updating the client part, I'm getting this for every attempt to download the updated server:

image.png

Did nothing special before that, so I suspect the issue might occur for other people too and we might want to fix it before tomorrow :)

This is the line in the stacktrace:

util.log.debug("Issuing request for released artifacts metadata to", requestUrl);
const response = await node_fetch_1.default(requestUrl, { headers: { Accept: "application/vnd.github.v3+json" } });

and it looks like this change might be related: https://github.com/rust-analyzer/rust-analyzer/commit/3e0e4e90aeeff25db674f8db562c611bd8016482

cc @std::Veetaha

Oh, thanks.
Weird, but sure, I can reinstall.
Hm that works indeed, hope it's not due to a different code used for the new installation case.
